title: What will be the next big advancement in cellphone technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: The next big trend in technology will be smart glasses we wear everywhere.Microsoft, Snap, Facebook, Google, Apple and Amazon are all working on computers we wear on our faces that may replace our phones.Current devices are too big and expensive, but eventually they’ll come down in price and size.Amazon, Google, Magic Leap, Facebook and Microsoft all have foundations in place to create computers that we wear on our faces. Now the race is on for getting there first and for selling them to consumers at affordable prices that make them must-have products.

I reckon when cellphone or smartphone technology merges with augmented reality things will change quite fundamentally. At the moment the phone is clunky, more or less contained within a single unit and needs to be shifted left, right and centre - pocket to hand to ear to pocket etc. The tech will start fixing. The smartwatch is an early advance but a good example of tech that utilises an existing device in a new context. Glasses will follow. Earpieces and headphones, microphones and other devices too. Basically the sort of stuff that is internal in robots will start appearing as external fashion around us.

Smartphone would be customizable, it's camera can be updated separately, sound separately and much more, In short the user would be able to change hardware of the Smartphone itself, (Few phone has this ability but it was just a module that was from Motorola, few famous mods were Game Mod , battery mod and a projector mod) But in near future user would be able to change the integrated hardware if he loves photography he would customize it for best photography results, While a gamer would try to customize his Smartphone's for best gaming experience.(FYI still Smartphone's is not preferred by most of the gamer's)

I think the next big evolution in smartphone technology will be turning them into other devices. By that I mean making your smartphone a pair of smart glasses, or putting the whole phone on your wrist or creating a projector that turns any surface into a screen, etc. Currently smartphones are limited by their form factor, getting rid of their current form factor will open up new possibilities.

This entirely depends on how quickly manufacturers can work and deploy these new advancements. However, I think it'll be the 64MP cameras, then the graphene batteries, then an under display camera. Reason for under-display camera being lowest is because manufacturers will have to not only make sure of it's quality, but also manage costs and production speeds.

From Samsung a previous events, a complete screen, and foldable screen are more or like a year far(fold will release on April ) . So, these two are the next big technology.    Now, let's get serious. These are amazing and probably the next big technology. What I personally want to see is a holographic phone. I think companies are working on it. Let's hope it becomes real , soon .
